text: Edward Stanley Watsford (28 January 1874 – 21 August 1927) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He was the brother of Doug Watsford who also played for Collingwood. == Notes == == External links == * *Stan Watsford's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1874 births Category:1927 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Stan Watsford
